channel.title: Mass: Unveiled For Children
channel.desc: Fr. Antoine discusses the Mass in a manner and terms easily understood by small children. He begins by addressing the usual comment of small children: 'I find going to Mass boring' and he shows how it can be made otherwise. Fr. Antoine fully explains the role of and the meaning of altar, candles, holy water font, tabernacle, genuflection, preparation for Mass, vestments, posture, Word of God, homily, consecration, Our Father, and communion. (30 minutes).
